6 PrimitivePlanner::PrimitivePlanner(ros::NodeHandle &nh):PlannerBase(nh),time_offset_(0.0),index_of_primitive_(0)
7 {
8  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new LinePrimitive(0.1,0.5,4));
9  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new CirclePrimitive(0.1,0.5,3,1.57));
10  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new LinePrimitive(0.1,0.5,4));
11  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new CirclePrimitive(0.1,0.5,3,1.57));
12  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new LinePrimitive(0.1,0.5,4));
13  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new CirclePrimitive(0.1,0.5,3,1.57));
14  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new LinePrimitive(0.1,0.5,4));
15  this->list_of_primitives_.push_back(new CirclePrimitive(0.1,0.5,3,1.57));
16 
17  this->current_it_=this->list_of_primitives_.begin();
18  this->current_primitive_=*(this->current_it_);
19 
20  if(!this->checkCompatibility(this->list_of_primitives_))
21  {
22  ROS_WARN("Incompatibility in primitive list occured!");
23  }
24 }
25 PrimitivePlanner::~PrimitivePlanner()
26 {
27  delete this->current_primitive_;
28  this->list_of_primitives_.clear();
29 }

33 tf::Vector3 PrimitivePlanner::get_position(ros::Duration time)
34 {
35  std::vector<tf::Transform> pos=this->current_primitive_->getPosition();
36 
37  return pos.at(this->lookupIndexTime(time.toSec())).getOrigin();

62 int PrimitivePlanner::lookupIndexTime(double time)
63 {
64  double complete_time=this->current_primitive_->getTime();
65  int index=(int)floor((time-this->time_offset_)/complete_time*this->current_primitive_->getSize());
66  if(index<0)
67  {
68  ROS_WARN("Index below zero!");
69  index=0;
70  }
71  if(index>=this->current_primitive_->getSize())
72  {
73  index=this->current_primitive_->getSize()-1;
74  ROS_WARN("Reached end of primitive!");
75  }
76  return index;
77 }
78 bool PrimitivePlanner::checkCompatibility(std::list<Primitive*> list)
79 {
80  list.front()->interpolate(0.01);
81  tf::Transform last_position=list.front()->getPosition().back();
82  double last_vel=list.front()->getVelocity().back().length();
83  bool succeed=true;
84 
85  for(auto element=list.begin()++;element!=list.end();element++)
86  {
87  (*element)->start_vel_=last_vel;
88  (*element)->start_point_=last_position;
89  if(!(*element)->interpolate(0.01))
90  {
91  succeed=false;
92  }
93  last_position=(*element)->getPosition().back();
94  last_vel=(*element)->getVelocity().back().length();
95  }
96  return succeed;
97 }
98 void PrimitivePlanner::check_period(ros::Duration time)
99 {
100  if(time.toSec()>=this->current_primitive_->getTime()+this->time_offset_)
101  {
102 
103  if(this->current_it_!=this->list_of_primitives_.end())
104  {
105  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Changing primitive!");
106  this->time_offset_+=this->current_primitive_->getTime();
107  this->current_it_++;
108  this->current_primitive_=*(this->current_it_);
109  }
110  else
111  {
112  this->pause();
113  }
114 
115  }
116 }

164 bool PrimitivePlanner::LinePrimitive::interpolate(double linspace)
165 {
166  this->positions_.clear();
167  this->velocities_.clear();
168  this->accelerations_.clear();
169  this->angular_velocities_.clear();
170 
171 
172  tf::Transform rot=tf::Transform(this->start_point_.getRotation(),tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0));
173  this->accelerations_.push_back(this->accel_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
174  this->velocities_.push_back(this->start_vel_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
175  this->positions_.push_back(this->start_point_);
176 
177 
178  double length=0.0;
179  double time=0.0;
180 
181  bool vel_reached=false;
182  bool abort=false;
183  int iterations=0;
184 
185  double vel=this->start_vel_;
186 
187 
188  while(!abort && iterations<100000)
189  {
190 
191  double d_vel=this->accel_*linspace;
192  if(vel+d_vel>this->vel_max_)
193  {
194  d_vel=this->vel_max_-vel;
195  vel_reached=true;
196  }
197 
198  double d_l=(vel+0.5*d_vel)*linspace;
199  if(length+d_l>this->length_)
200  {
201  double scale=(this->length_-length)/d_l;
202  d_l=scale*d_l;
203  linspace=scale*linspace;
204  abort=true;
205  }
206  vel+=d_vel;
207  length+=d_l;
208  time+=linspace;
209 
210 
211  this->accelerations_.push_back(this->accel_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
212  this->velocities_.push_back(vel*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
213  this->positions_.push_back(tf::Transform((this->start_point_).getRotation(),
214  this->start_point_*(length*(tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)))));
215 
216 
217 
218  iterations++;
219  }
220  for(int i=0;i<this->velocities_.size();i++)
221  {
222  this->angular_velocities_.push_back(0.0);
223  }
224  this->time_=time;
225  return vel_reached;
226 }

230 PrimitivePlanner::CirclePrimitive::CirclePrimitive(double accel, double vel_max, double radius, double angle):
231  angle_(angle),
232  radius_(radius),
233  accel_(accel),
234  vel_max_(vel_max)
235 {
236 
237 }
238 bool PrimitivePlanner::CirclePrimitive::interpolate(double linspace)
239 {
240  this->positions_.clear();
241  this->velocities_.clear();
242  this->accelerations_.clear();
243  this->angular_velocities_.clear();
244 
245  tf::Transform rot=tf::Transform(tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(0)*this->start_point_.getRotation(),tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0));
246  this->velocities_.push_back(this->start_vel_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
247  this->accelerations_.push_back(this->accel_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
248  this->positions_.push_back(tf::Transform((this->start_point_*rot).getRotation(),
249  this->start_point_.getOrigin()));
250 
251 
252  double length=0.0;
253  double time=0.0;
254 
255  bool vel_reached=false;
256  bool abort=false;
257  int iterations=0;
258 
259  double ang_acc=this->accel_/this->radius_;
260  double omega=this->start_vel_/this->radius_;
261  double omega_max=this->vel_max_/this->radius_;
262 
263 
264  while(!abort && iterations<100000)
265  {
266  double d_omega=ang_acc*linspace;
267  if(omega+d_omega>omega_max)
268  {
269  d_omega=omega_max-omega;
270  vel_reached=true;
271  }
272 
273  double d_l=(omega+0.5*d_omega)*linspace;
274  if(length+d_l>this->angle_)
275  {
276  double scale=(this->angle_-length)/d_l;
277  d_l=scale*d_l;
278  linspace=scale*linspace;
279  abort=true;
280  }
281  omega+=d_omega;
282  length+=d_l;
283 
284  rot.setRotation(this->start_point_.getRotation()*tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(length));
285  tf::Vector3 d_pos=d_l*this->radius_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0));
286 
287  this->accelerations_.push_back(ang_acc*this->radius_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
288  this->velocities_.push_back(omega*this->radius_*(rot*tf::Vector3(1.0,0.0,0.0)));
289  this->positions_.push_back(tf::Transform(rot.getRotation(),
290  this->positions_.back().getOrigin()+d_pos));
291 
292  time+=linspace;
293  iterations++;
294  }
295  for(int i=0;i<this->velocities_.size();i++)
296  {
297  this->angular_velocities_.push_back(omega);
298  }
299  this->time_=time;
300  return vel_reached;
301 }
